ModulePrefs.title: MySpace Gadget
ModulePrefs.description: The MySpace Gadget gives you access to your MySpace activity stream, your latest messages, status updates from your friends, and much more. Once you install the gadget, simply login to MySpace by clicking the Login button in the gadget and enjoy instant access to your MySpace data from iGoogle.
ModulePrefs.author: MySpace
